name: bj-sbf4
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wnf(s1, w0)), wnf(s1, w0))

|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wnf(s1, w0)), wnf(s1, w0))

comment: Substitution has no effect on a bound variable (nonfreeness case); see ~ sbf2 . (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.)
